workflow.name: Monitor G2 competitors reviews [Google Sheets, ScrapingBee, Slack]
workflow.description:
This workflow monitor G2 reviews URLS. 

When a new review is published, it will: 
- trigger a Slack notification 
- record the review in Google Sheets

To install it, you'll need: 
- access to Slack, Google Sheets and ScrapingBee

Full guide here: https://lempire.notion.site/Scrape-G2-reviews-with-n8n-3f46e280e8f24a68b3797f98d2fba433?pvs=4

parameters.content:
Add your API key here

1. Sign up here
https://app.scrapingbee.com/

2. Get your API key

3. Paste it the node

# Read me
This workflow monitor G2 reviews URLS. 

When a new review is published, it will: 
- trigger a Slack notification 
- record the review in Google Sheets


To install it, you'll need access to Slack, Google Sheets and ScrapingBee

### Full guide here: https://lempire.notion.site/Scrape-G2-reviews-with-n8n-3f46e280e8f24a68b3797f98d2fba433?pvs=4

nodes.name: Continue only if review is new
Add new review to Google Sheets

main.node: Continue only if review is new
Add new review to Google Sheets
Continue only if review is new
